component.name: OverviewDialog
component.script:
sub setTitle() m.top.findNode("titleArea").primaryTitle = m.top.title end sub
sub setOverview() m.top.findNode("description").text = m.top.overview end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as string, press as boolean) as boolean if press = false then return false
if key = "OK" m.top.close = true end if
return false end function
